interactions.invalidUser.title: Invalid user
interactions.invalidUser.description: The user you specified is not valid.
interactions.rateLimited.title: You are being rate-limited
interactions.rateLimited.description.too: You have used this command too many times ({times}) in too short of a span of time.
interactions.rateLimited.description.can: You will once again be able to use the command {relative_timestamp}.
interactions.show.sureToShow.title: Sure to show?
interactions.show.sureToShow.description: Are you sure you want to show the message in chat?
